players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I find it strange that Diana was the one who was found dead last night. Let's be vigilant and keep an eye on each other during this game."
Charlie: "I agree with Alice. Let's all keep a close eye on each other to ensure fair play and trust in this game."
Bob: "Based on my investigation during the night, I have reason to believe that Charlie is the mafioso. It would be in everyone's best interest if we all vote for Charlie tonight."
Charlie: "I find it odd that Bob accused me so quickly without any solid evidence. Let's focus on finding the real killer and not make baseless accusations."

You: "I believe that we should all work together to find the real killer in our midst. Bob's accusation against Charlie was hasty and lacked solid evidence. Let us focus on gathering more information before making any decisions."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob

players.name: Bob

Charlie: "I find it odd that Bob accused me so quickly without any solid evidence. Let's focus on finding the real killer and not make baseless accusations."
